title: Jack Gets His Man
description: Will Jack catch a thief or find love?Jack's life is awesome.Well, not totally awesome. His upcoming birthday is making him restless, and his ex is being a pain in his fabulous behind.Nothing a smoking hot new bookkeeper can't solve.Until the hottie discovers things at Jack's store aren't as they seem. Someone is playing fast and loose with the finances.The Gray-Haired Knitting Detectives jump in their geriatric shoes at the chance to help. They may even have time to find Jack's missing money in between re-enacting spy thrillers and setting Jack up on dates.Will Jack catch a thief or find love?Either way Jack's going to get his man.
author: Elaine Spaan
